definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
the straw that broke the camel’s back (idiom)/the final straw
pinyin: ya1 si3 luo4 tuo5 de5 zui4 hou4 yi1 gen1 dao4 cao3
containing_words.word: 压死骆驼的最后一根稻草

sentences.english: Authorities in Thailand confirmed one woman was killed when a wall in her house collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 泰国官方表示一位泰国妇女被自家倒塌的墙壁压死。

sentences.english: Corey never relented, and was eventually crushed to death under the massive weight.
sentences.chinese: 科里没有妥协，并最终因负重过大而被压死。

sentences.english: People lay crushed to death beneath the rubble of their houses.
sentences.chinese: 人们被压死在房屋的瓦砾堆下。

sentences.english: In 1906, however, Pierre, who was crossing a road, was run over and killed. (who… ≈ when he…)
sentences.chinese: 1906年，皮埃尔在横穿马路时被车压死了。

sentences.english: During the night this woman's son died because she lay on him.
sentences.chinese: 夜间，这妇人睡着的时候，压死了她的孩子。

sentences.english: She reeked of death having been buried next to other bodies that were killed instantly in the quake.
sentences.chinese: 她从地震后被立即压死的人里活了过来。

sentences.english: Many people were probably pressed to death without even waking up.
sentences.chinese: 许多人可能还没醒过来就被压死了。

sentences.english: They're young people, young people dead under the house.
sentences.chinese: 他们都是年轻人，被倒塌的房子压死了。

sentences.english: He narrowly missed being run over by a car.
The Environmental Conservation Department sends road kill to feed the falcons.
sentences.chinese: 环境保护部将公路上撞死或压死的动物送来喂游隼。

definition: to cause sth to collapse under the weight/(fig.) to overwhelm
to knock down and kill sb with a car/to run over sb/to run sb down
to be scared out of one's wits/to scare stiff
to press down/to crush down/to restrain (anger)/to keep down (voice)
full to the point of bursting/(coll.) at most
to hack to death/to kill with an ax
